column5: Hi all,  I'm headed to London this Monday on business.  I figure while I'm there I'd like to try some local fishing.  I'll be staying at the Delta London (325 Dundas St).  Does anyone have any suggestions on some nearby fishing?  I'd like to hook into some bass in the evening if my schedule allows for it.  Thanks.
Try Fanshawe conservation area. They have bass, pike & walleye in the lake.
You can find Bass just about any where in the Thames, it is about a quarter mile west of your hotel.
